questions.question: Which statement describes all enzymes?

choices.answer: They control the transport of materials.
They provide energy for chemical reactions

They absorb oxygen from the environment.

choices.answer: Enzymes are composed of polypeptide chains.
Enzymes R destroyed when used and must be made for each rxn.
